sentences: Wojciech Antoni Waglewski (born 21 April 1953 in Nowy Sącz) is a Polish musician; singer, guitarist, composer, arranger and producer, a member of Polish Society of the Phonographic Industry and Polish Film Academy.
As of 2013, he has been nominated to twenty-three Fryderyk awards (Polish equivalent of Grammy) and won five times.
In 2010 and 2011, he was the art director of concert tour Męskie Granie.
Wojciech is married to Grażyna, the couple has two sons (both are hip-hop musicians): Fisz (Bartosz, born 1978) and Emade (Piotr, born 1981).
